description:
The Sugarloaf Junior mitt is a top choice for your child's winter activities, providing exceptional insulation and a soft faux-fur lining for assured warmth. Its waterproof and windproof membrane keeps their hands dry, and the elastic wrist and insulated long cuff ensure a secure, comfortable fit throughout the day.

  • Waterproof and breathable Nylon shell to keep hands warm and dry
  • Soft Brushed Bremberg fleece lining for all day comfort
  • Insulated long cuff and elastic wrist for added coverage
name: Auclair Sugarloaf 3.0 Junior Mitts - Youths
